ygData.subject: Fw: GZ Letter was Pixie Strike broken
ygData.msgSnippet: Notice the sent date (October 18) - there is something MAJORLY wrong with onelist - it s recycling old messages.  It makes me wonder if new ones are getting
ygData.messageBody:
Notice the sent date (October 18) - there is something MAJORLY wrong with
onelist - it's recycling old messages. It makes me wonder if new ones are
getting lost. The list owner needs to contact the vendor...

Slyde of Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 2:33 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ Letter was Pixie Strike broken


> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> Did you get ANY sort of response from GZ regarding your letter?
>
> Slyde
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <kim@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 2:43 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
>
>
> > It was not in the letter. I've been /bugging it. Now that
> > I'm hitting the upper level limit for charm, I'm getting more
> > annoyed by it and will probably fire off an email to GZ asking
> > about it at some point.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
